title: Rachel Zegler
summary: Rachel Anne Zegler (; born May 3, 2001) is an American actress and singer. Zegler first came to prominence with her film debut playing Maria Vasquez in the Steven Spielberg musical adaptation West Side Story (2021) for which she won the Golden Globe Award for Best Actress – Motion Picture Comedy or Musical. She also portrayed Anthea in the DC Superhero film Shazam! Fury of the Gods (2023).
